text: listen Libby I think there are some
things we should talk about now that
we're almost there we're almost there
I'm so excited like a thousand
butterflies are erupting in my stomach
dad and I are finally going to be
together
me and my dad will spend every day
making up for the time lost when he was
away we'll play complicated board games
and then crochet we'll make plaid and
just me and my dad
we'll pack a picnic and ride our bikes
he'll insist on playing the Bongos at my
open mics
encouraging words
okay lib shake it off and my mom will
think so he's really changed every
birthday cake will taste a little
sweeter than the Nora will burn brighter
with him there he'll help to make my
writing better we'll Workshop everything
together we'll be the world's
best-selling father daughter
me and my dad we've been apart for so
long I was scared he didn't care about
me scared he was gone but now he's
coming back and I'm singing a happy song
I'm not sad cause at last it's me and my
dad
[Music]
oh uh what were you gonna say Mom
[Music]
you and me for all times
